system.effect:
Trigger: See Effect
Effect: Effects depend on whether your Pokémon has the Tolerance or Exploit ability.
- Whenever your Pokémon with Tolerance takes Super-Effective damage from a Tagged foe, your Pokémon may spend 2 Momentum to Resist that attack one step.
- Whenever your Pokémon with Exploit deals Resisted damage to a Tagged foe, your Pokémon may spend 2 Momentum to increase the effectiveness of the attack one step.
system.name: Type Methodology [CR]
